hero.description: Advanced analytics and tools for Intervals.icu users. Deep dive into your data with our free suite of professional metrics.

power.title: Power Analysis
power.desc: Deep dive into your critical power and anaerobic work capacity.

fatigue.title: Fatigue Monitor
fatigue.desc: Track chronic training load to optimize your form.

intervals.title: Intervals
intervals.desc: Automated detection and classification of efforts.

progress.title: Progress
progress.desc: Visualize your improvements over time intuitively.

zones.title: Zone Distribution
zones.desc: Analyze time in zones to ensure training compliance.

donation.description: DeepMetric Lite is and always will be free. Your support helps keep the servers running and contributes to the ecosystem.

login.title: Sign In
login.label: Intervals.icu API Key
login.error: Invalid API Key. Please check your Intervals.icu settings.
login.help: Where can I find my key?

readiness.title: Readiness Monitor V2
readiness.desc: Advanced analysis of HRV, resting heart rate, and sleep to determine your daily form.

readiness.subtitle: Advanced biometric analysis for daily training optimization
readiness.null_detection_desc: If sleep data or score is missing, the system ignores those penalties to avoid skewing the result, based only on HRV and RHR.
readiness.sensitivity_desc: HRV ratio is kept raised to the power of 1.4 to prioritize central nervous system status.
readiness.diag_partial: ⚠️ Partial diagnosis: Without sleep data, the score depends exclusively on your cardiovascular response.
readiness.diag_critical: Critical fatigue detected. Load assimilation is null, prioritize sleep and rest.
readiness.diag_warning: Accumulated fatigue state. Good day for mobility or Zone 1.
readiness.diag_optimal: Physiology in balance. Ready to absorb intensity.
readiness.no_data: No data available for the last 30 days.
